notes: a horizontal stroke
mnemonic: one stick

notes: two parallel lines
mnemonic: two sticks

notes: three parallel lines
mnemonic: three sticks

notes: a dispersal of breath
mnemonic: standing in a room with four walls

notes: one first counts to five on one hand and then crosses back the other way to ten
mnemonic: three and two sticks cross each other to make five

notes: a shed or cabin
mnemonic: four walls, a roof, and ground make a six-sided surface

notes: cutting something - in olden days, a sacrifice was held every seven days after death, until the forty-nineth day (7 x 7)
mnemonic: one of the seven mysteries

notes: two bent lines meaning 'to divide'
mnemonic: divide equally four to the left and four to the right

notes: a stylized hand, with bent wrist/forearm - claw
mnemonic: a cat with nine lives brings good luck

notes: a vertical stroke indicating a tally of ten; a horizontal stroke meaning complete
mnemonic: tally marks one in ten

notes: an open mouth
mnemonic: the opening of one's mouth is enclosed by their lips

notes: the sun; similar to the egyption hieroglyph 𓇳
mnemonic: the sun is much bigger than earth

notes: a crescent moon
mnemonic: the moon with its crescent shape is the second to rise in a day

notes: a field
mnemonic: farm land is ten acres of open space

notes: human eye; similar to the egyption hieroglyph 𓁹
mnemonic: a person is given two eyes, which are the windows to their soul

notes: ten day old food (十) spat from ones mouth (口)
mnemonic: food past ten days old is spit from one's mouth

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 五 (five)
mnemonic: because I have five senses, I am myself

notes: 冃 (hat) + 目 (eyes) - to cover one's eyes
mnemonic: the tight-rope is so high up and the risk of falling great, they covered their eyes to hide from the sight; given the risk before him, his brows nitted with bold determination

notes: two strings of cowries
mnemonic: the moon and her companion

notes: 日 (sun) + 月 (moon) - the sun just rising and the moon not yet set
kun_yomi: あ.かり、あか.るい、あか.るむ、あか.らむ、あき.らか、あ.ける、-あ.け、あ.く、あ.くる、あ.かす
mnemonic: when both the sun and the moon are in the sky, the day will be even brighter

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 昌 (prosperous) - chanting a prayer for good tidings
mnemonic: one will sing with great joy when they prosper

notes: triplication of 日 (sun) - twinkling stars
mnemonic: three sparkling stars glisten in the night sky

notes: triplication of 口 (mouth) - three vessles or crates
mnemonic: many mouths solicit goods in the market

notes: vertebrae (口) connected together
mnemonic: the head and body are held up by their spine

notes: semantic 日 (sun) + semantic 口 (mouth); 口 eventually developed into 曰
mnemonic: prosperity comes with working hard from dawn to dusk

notes: 日 (sun) + 甲 (first) - when the sun first rises
kun_yomi: はや.い、はや、はや-、はや.まる、はや.める、さ-
mnemonic: the sun rises early to warm the leaves

notes: semantic 日 (sun) + phonetic 九 (nine)
mnemonic: a new dawn brings new oportunity

notes: three leaves (十) on a branch
mnemonic: three leaves are the start of three new generations ( 丗 )

notes: a vessal 口 holding rice 米 that is part of the body (⺼)
mnemonic: rice from the field is best stored in the stomach

notes: the sun (日) appearing over the horizon (一)
kun_yomi: あき.らか、あきら、ただし、あさ、あした
mnemonic: morning comes when the sun peeks over the horizon

notes: semantic ⺼ (body part) + phonetic 旦 (morning) - solar plexus
mnemonic: meat first thing in the morning is hard on the gallbladder

notes: 二 (mules) + 回 (spinning wheel) - horse mill
mnemonic:
the span of a day is from morning to night --
submit a request to the rikshaw puller and their revolving two wheeled cart
日 is derived from 𓇳, which is similar to 回

notes: depression within an object
mnemonic: take a piece from a square to make it concave

notes: extrusion from an object
mnemonic: give a piece to a square to make it convex

notes: the sun (日) appearing from the previous day (丨)
mnemonic: the sun rises from the previous day

notes: 丿 (finger) + 目 (nose) - pointing to one's nose to gester to oneself
kun_yomi: みずか.ら、おの.ずから、おの.ずと
mnemonic: one points to their nose with two open nostrils to refer to themself

notes: hill of the sunrise; appear in glory - (丶) points to the sun's rays; similar to the egyptian hieroglyph 𓈍
mnemonic: a finger points to the rays of pure, white light as they shine over the hill

notes: semantic 一 (a number) + phonetic 白 (pure; white)
mnemonic: the great oak carries hundreds of little acorns on its branches

notes: a flag pole and a drum (placed in the center of a field)
mnemonic: a drum and flagpole are placed in the center of the field to gather people and detect the direction of wind

notes: semantic 十 (a number) + phonetic 人 (person)
mnemonic: ten people reach a hundred (age), the total years would be a thousand; there are thousands of single people in the world

notes: a forked tongue 千 emerging upwards from a mouth (口); 一 emphasizes the tongue
mnemonic: recognize the fork in the snake's tongue

notes: 十 (handle with a decorative ring) + 丿 (dipper head) + ㇀ (something being added); a dipper (ancient measuring box/cup) that is being filled
mnemonic: the elder ascended up twenty flights of stairs with his walking cane

notes: semantic 日 (sun) + phonetic 升 (ascend) - sunrise
mnemonic: the sun rose up in the sky to light the elder's way

notes: 厂 (hand) + メ (an object) - something that can be tilted and turned; something round
mnemonic: the cat's paws play with the little round ball of yarn

notes: a position on the forearm for measuring one's pulse (the wrist or base of the hand)
mnemonic: measuring the small pulse in one's wrist

notes: the forearm
mnemonic: some cultures use to measure from their elbow to their wrist

notes: 寸 (skill of one's hand) + 𤰔 (organization) - specializing in something
mnemonic: for a special cause, the girl gave a little of herself

notes: semantic 十 (ten) + phonetic 尃 (to announce)
mnemonic: after ten years, the student was honered with a phd

notes: 卜 (divination) + 口 (mouth) - fortune-telling
mnemonic: the oracle read the cracks in the bones

notes: a line above another; up
kun_yomi: うえ、-うえ、うわ-、かみ、あ.げる、-あ.げる、あ.がる、-あ.がる、あ.がり、-あ.がり、のぼ.る、のぼ.り、のぼ.せる、のぼ.す、よ.す
mnemonic: one step above ground

notes: a line below another; down
kun_yomi: した、しも、もと、さ.げる、さ.がる、くだ.る、くだ.り、くだ.す、-くだ.す、くだ.さる、お.ろす、お.りる
mnemonic: one bone has a crack splitting downward

notes: semantic ⺊ (person) + phonetic 早 (early) - independent
mnemonic: it was fortold the sun would rise early this day; now it is eminent; the sun is already peeking

notes: 屮 (grass) or even 木 (tree) + 日 (sun) + 月 (moon) - the sun rising above the ground while the waning moon is still in the sky - the morning
mnemonic: this morning, the sun rose from out of the grass to join the moon before the imperial court

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 朝 (court) - mockery
mnemonic: laughed out of court; dismissed with ridicule

notes: airflow coming out of a mouth (口) - a modal particle
mnemonic: only eight breaths of air came from their mouth

notes: 目 (shell) + 八 (fish) - cowry
mnemonic: that bracelet cost eight cowry shells (cowries were used as currency in ancient china)

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 貝 (cowry)
mnemonic: one will sing with joy come pay-day (see 貝)

notes: ⺊ (integrity) + 貝 (ship's hull) - hull integrity is good
mnemonic: be honest in your dealings with your fellow men; the most devine cowry among the shelfish are considered true and faithful

notes: a 〇 indicating the top edge of a 鼎 (food-pot/ding) - round; a chef
mnemonic: employees are paid according to the work they are asked to do

notes: semantic 鼎 (basket) + phonetic 𠧪 (fruits and vegetables) - applying seasoning to a dish
mnemonic: the servant was paid in cowry to post his will throughout the village

notes: 目 (eye) + 儿 (human) - an eye on a pair of legs; originally a human figure with a large eye for a head
mnemonic: what eyes do best

notes: an infant with an imperfect cranium
mnemonic: a new pair of legs brought forth from the previous generation

notes: a figure with two lines (二) for a head - one connected to the body and one above emphasizing the head
mnemonic: once upon a time, the story began, a little girl skipped by wearing a wreath of flowers

notes: head of a kneeling person, emphasising 'head'
kun_yomi: ぺえじ、おおがい、かしら
mnemonic: one page from the eight-page manuscript

notes: semantic 頁 (head) + phonetic 元 (beginning) - big-headed
mnemonic: stubborness originates from their arrogant head

notes: 几 (table) + 丶 (plate) - a plate; a flat dish
kun_yomi: およ.そ、おうよ.そ、すべ.て
mnemonic: the wind here is pretty common

notes: 人 (⺈ - person) + 貝 (cowry)
mnemonic: you have to carry the price of defeat; the victor is paid after defeating their opponent in a (sword) dual

notes: a type of dancer; musicians; see also 𓂓
mnemonic: some special dances require over 10,000 steps

notes: semantic 丩 (to entangle - originally two entangled ropes) + phonetic 口 (mouth)
mnemonic: a collection of sentences are wrapped into a recitable paragraph

notes: semantic ⺼ (skin) + phonetic 几 (surface; table)
mnemonic: when the wind blows, the texture of her skin changes from soft to rough (chills)

notes: semantic 日 (sun/day) + phonetic 螾 (earthworm)
mnemonic: a sequence of days are wrapped into a period of time

notes: something (丶) in the ladle or spoon (勹)
mnemonic: a ladle wraps a little curry for tasting

notes: semantic 白 (white) + phonetic 勺 (ladle) - white target
mnemonic: this acorn stew really hits the spot

notes: an animal with a long mouth and horns
mnemonic: a bull's head is attached at their neck

notes: a developing plant; intestine of a fish; gill bone of a fish
mnemonic: dangling fish guts

notes: 舌 (tongue) + 乚 (hidden/unknown) - unknown tongue
kun_yomi: みだ.れる、みだ.る、みだ.す、みだ、おさ.める、わた.る
mnemonic: tower of babel - unknown tongues led to chaos; though hidden, the serpent still manages to cause chaos

notes: 目 (eye) + 十 (looking straight ahead) + 𠃊 (nose bridge) - looking straight ahead
kun_yomi: ただ.ちに、なお.す、-なお.す、なお.る、なお.き、す.ぐ
mnemonic: from the corner of her eyes she staired sincerely (十 represents eyelashess)

notes: 貝 (shell, money) + 廾 (two hands)
mnemonic: for twenty cowry they had the means to buy one tool

notes: 匕 (spoon, fork) + 鼎 (ancient food vessel) - using a fork to fetch food from a cauldron
mnemonic: you hit the nail on the head, with your hammer, strike the nail true

notes: a bladed tool
mnemonic: a craftsman is one who has gone above and beyond

notes: a left hand
mnemonic: the artist's left hand (in a mirror)

notes: a right hand
mnemonic: one shows their right hand when giving an oath

notes: semantic ⺼ (meat) + phonetic 又 (hand) - a hand holding meat, hence 'in possession of'
mnemonic: they had in their hand the substance of which they maintained

notes: 貝 (money) + 有 (giving) - a gift or pay-off
mnemonic: to pay is to offer money for them to have; look, here is money

notes: semantic 貝 (cowry) + phonetic 工 (craft)
mnemonic: as a tribute the craftsman was commisioned

notes: semantic 頁 (head) + phonetic 工 (craft)
mnemonic: paragraphs are crafted together on a page; the artisan carried the kitten by the scruff of its neck

notes: a knife
mnemonic: the samurai's katana is held upright with an arch like a hook

notes: 刀 (knife) + 丶 (finger pointing) - pointing at the blade of the knife
mnemonic: pointing at the sword's blade or edge

notes: semantic 刀 (knife) + phonetic 七 (cutting something)
kun_yomi: き.る、-き.る、き.り、-き.り、-ぎ.り、き.れる、-き.れる、き.れ、-き.れ、-ぎ.れ
mnemonic: A knife bisecting something - suggesting the act of **cutting** or **carving.**

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 刀 (knife) - to call out (with one's mouth)
mnemonic: a sword proceeded from His mouth calling out to them (sharp tongue)

notes: semantic 日 (sun) + phonetic 召 (call out)
mnemonic: and His word was glorious and bright and cutteth to the core

notes: 鼎 (ding, a bronze cauldron for cooking or sacrificial rituals) + 刂 (knife) - sacrifice
mnemonic: the law demands payment by way of sacrifice

notes: semantic 刂 (knife) + phonetic 畐 (to fill)
mnemonic: the smith filled their shop with copies of the master blade

notes: 冎 (bone) + 刂 (knife) - to cut up bone and flesh
mnemonic: the mouth tells of how the two blades are different; using the blade of penmanship, a portion of the story was separated into different sections

notes: a city wall; a head; a nail
on_yomi: チョウ、テイ、チン、トウ、チ
mnemonic: turn left and follow the road up to the T-intersection

notes: semantic 田 (field) + phonetic 丁 (road)
mnemonic: take a left on the road to head into farming-town

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 丂 (passing of air) - from the mouth one can sound
mnemonic: you can breath (丂 is written as 丁)

notes: semantic 頁 (head) + phonetic 丁 (road)
mnemonic: follow the road until you reach its peak

notes: an image of a baby, with a large head and spread arms, the legs are wrapped in a blanket
mnemonic: A young **child** wrapped in a swaddle with arms stretched out.

notes: 丿 (opening) + 子 (child) - opening in the skull of a newborn
mnemonic: the child hid in a hole while playing hide-n-go-seek

notes: a baby wrapped in a blanket, with only the head visible
mnemonic: a baby is wrapped completely in swaddling clothes

notes: a woman with breasts kneeling or standing - turned on left side; only left breast is shown
mnemonic: a woman who can provide succour kneels (or stands) facing left

notes: 女 (woman) + 子 (child) - child in a woman's arms or on the woman's back
mnemonic: A mother with her child insinuating **love,** friendliness, or something good.

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 女 (woman) - a woman obeying an order
mnemonic: a woman such as one who obeys orders

notes: a woman with breasts with nipples kneeling or standing
mnemonic: a mother with two breasts (this glyph is rotated 90 degrees counterclockwise)

notes: semantic 貝 (shell) + phonetic 毌 (string of coins)
mnemonic: a piercing needle formed a string of coins (cowry); braces - metal anchors bracing teeth pierced by a metal wire

notes: 口 (authority) + 儿 (kneeling) - kneeling elder sibling
mnemonic: the elder brother kneels and reasons

notes: incantation at an alter (simplified as 咒)
kun_yomi: まじな.う、のろ.い、まじな.い、のろ.う
mnemonic: praise (or a rebuke) is given to the elder brother

notes: 十 (shoulders; mantle) + 兄 (elder brother); weight on one's shoulders - to be able
mnemonic: Christ wore a crown of thorns but overcame the world

notes: three dots; three granules of sand; three grains of rice
mnemonic: Three **small** grains of sand or rice.

notes: four dots; few; little
mnemonic: add just a little more to the three grains

notes: a person (人) with arms stretched out as far as possible, implying the meaning of big/great/large
kun_yomi: おお-、おお.きい、-おお.いに
mnemonic: a person stretches their arms as far as possible showing how big

notes: two pieces of meat (肉); it was suggested that meat was scarce in ancient times, so two pieces of meat was a lot
mnemonic: one has much meat when they are given two portions (肉 historically corrupted to 夕)

notes: moon crescent
mnemonic: a cresent moon of the evening

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 夕 (evening)
mnemonic: the cresent moon pulls in the evening tides

notes: semantic 卜 (devining) + phonetic 月 (moon)
kun_yomi: そと、ほか、はず.す、はず.れる、と-
mnemonic: the moon is outside the house below

notes: 夕 (crescent moon) + 口 (mouth) - to say one's own name to identify oneself in the dark
mnemonic: to say one's own name to identify themself in the dark

notes: a stone beneath a cliff (厂)
mnemonic: a stone beneath a cliff

notes: semantic 月 (moon) + phonetic 小 (small) - waning moon
mnemonic: little grains resemble little moons

notes: semantic 石 (stone) + phonetic 肖 (waning)
mnemonic: saltpeter has a likeness of stone

notes: semantic 石 (shards) + phonetic 卒 (soldier)
mnemonic: a stone (like a cannon ball) is used by a soldier to break the enemy

notes: 石 (stone) + 少 (fine; refined) - sand
mnemonic: sand is made up of a few small stones

notes: semantic 女 (woman) + phonetic 石 (stone)
kun_yomi: ねた.む、そね.む、つも.る、ふさ.ぐ
mnemonic: the woman was cold as stone with jealousy; the woman wanted to check a stone at the one she envied; the woman envied the stones (jewelry) they wore

notes: semantic 刂 (knife) + phonetic 肖 (waning)
mnemonic: using a carpenter's plane (knife), the wood was wittled into shape

notes: 火 (fire) + 卩 (kneeling person) - fire over a person's head, emphasizing the shining of light
mnemonic: fire over a person's head, emphasizing the shining of light; there is a radiant glow about her face

notes: semantic 丶 (emphasis) + phonetic 大 (big; great) - excessive
mnemonic: an exrta big (or plump) buddah

notes: a dog (犬) guarding four vessels (口) - containers; anubis and the four canopic jars
mnemonic: the vessels (or utensils) of a larger set

notes: 犬 (dog) + 自 (nose), referring to the dog's strong sense of smell
kun_yomi: くさ.い、-くさ.い、にお.う、にお.い
mnemonic: the smell of wet-dog

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 臭 (dog's nose)
mnemonic: using one's nose to sniff out the smell

notes: semantic 女 (woman) + phonetic 少 (few)
mnemonic: the woman has a few exquisite traits (少 could be seen as a smilling man with a mustache)

notes: 屮 (eyebrow) + 目 (eye) - squinting; focusing
mnemonic: there are a few eyes on the government's ministry; an eye single to the glory of God

notes: 厂 (cliff; cave on a cliff) + 𣆪 (jug)
mnemonic: the child carried a radiance of kindness as thick as the canyon walls

notes: semantic 大 (big; great) + phonetic 可 (passable) - not grouped, an odd couple, an strange combination
kun_yomi: く.しき、あや.しい、くし、めずら.しい
mnemonic: strange that a camel can go through the eye of a needle

notes: a stream between two river-banks
mnemonic: a stream flows between two river-banks

notes: islet in a river
mnemonic: islets in the river are called sandbanks

notes: semantic 頁 (head) + phonetic 川 (river)
mnemonic: to follow the guiding river head is obedience

notes: the stream (亅) flowing around land-markers
mnemonic: water flows around and through the landmarks

notes: semantic 水 + phonetic 仌
mnemonic: water turned to ice such that people can walk on it

notes: water (水) follows a long (一) and winding (丶) path - like a river; long
mnemonic: well of water springing up into everlasting life

notes: 白 (rising; pure) + 水 (water) - water spring
mnemonic: pure water comes from a spring

notes: semantic ⺼ (body part) + phonetic 泉 (a spring)
mnemonic: (pure japanese glyph) glands in your body are like little springs

notes: a spring (泉) bursting from a cliff-side (厂) - origin
mnemonic: a water spring from the cliff forms a beautiful meadow

notes: semantic 頁 (head) + phonetic 原 (meadow)
mnemonic: one wished to visit the meadow on the page

notes: semantic 氵 + phonetic 永
mnemonic: one makes long strokes to swim in water

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 召 (to call out)
mnemonic: (cranes) wading the waters and call to each other on the wetlands; a crane's mouth could be thought of as a sword piercing the wetland waters for food

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 中 (middle)
kun_yomi: おき、おきつ、ちゅう.する、わく
mnemonic: in the middle of the open sea

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 凡 (common)
mnemonic: water is generally common

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 工 (craft)
mnemonic: water runs poetically through a creek

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 太 (fat; plump; buddha)
kun_yomi: おご.る、にご.る、よな.げる
mnemonic: one cleanses their hands before the big buddha

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 十 (tea-leaf; berry)
mnemonic: one can make a broth from water and rice

notes: 氵 (water) + 少 (to lack; to be short of) - that which displaces water
mnemonic: at the edge of the water is a beach of sand made of many small rocks

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 朝 (morning)
mnemonic: morning tides with new opportunity

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 原 (meadow)
mnemonic: water is sourced from the meadow

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 𠯑 (tongue; to block the mouth)
mnemonic: taste of the water to live

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 肖 (waning)
mnemonic: water reduced the fire until it was extinguished

notes: semantic 氵 (river) + phonetic 兄 (elder)
kun_yomi: まし.て、いわ.んや、おもむき
mnemonic: of course, Christ walked on water; that is the situation

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 可 (passable)
mnemonic: water passes through a river

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 白 (ancor; pure)
mnemonic: a large acorn anchored the ship for an overnight stay

notes: semantic 水 (water) + phonetic 胡 (foreign)
mnemonic: an ancient extension of a body of water, now become its own as a lake

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 則 (law)
mnemonic: measuring by principle of water (historical note)

notes: a lump of clay on a potter's wheel
mnemonic: a lump of clay on a potter's wheel; grass growing from the ground

notes: semantic 口 (mouth) + phonetic 土 (earth)
mnemonic: spitting onto the ground

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 厭 (simplified as 厂 - dislike; bore)
kun_yomi: お.す、へ.す、おさ.える、お.さえる
mnemonic: the pressure from earth pushes up mountainous walls

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 奇 (strange; curious)
mnemonic: a curious bit of earth at the foot of the mountain

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 亘 (revolve)
mnemonic: a mound of earth fences off the span of this region

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 眞 (true; absolute)
kun_yomi: は.まる、は.める、うず.める、しず.める、ふさ.ぐ
mnemonic: a shovel was used to fill in the hole with earth

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 真 (true; absolute)
kun_yomi: は.まる、は.める、うず.める、しず.める、ふさ.ぐ
mnemonic: potery is filled with engravings

notes: stack of (clay, jade) tablets
mnemonic: the edge where the ground meets the wall mound; a jade tablet carved from earth that stands upright in the ground

notes: 丰 (field, ear of grass) + 寸 (control)
mnemonic: a small square jewel (like a ring or stamp) seals the enclosed message

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 厓 (shore)
mnemonic: water splashes against the shore (the edge of a cliff/land)

notes: semantic 又 (hand) + phonetic 𡳿 (to do) - to grasp, to hold
mnemonic: as if before an alter praying for a small time

notes: semantic 日 (sun; day) + phonetic 寺 (temple)
mnemonic: spend some time this day in a place of worship

notes: semantic 土 (earth) + phonetic 匀 (even; level)
mnemonic: earth is level when it is uniformaly even; a gentle person is level-headed

notes: a fire with flying embers
mnemonic: two logs crossed together, a flame in the middle, with embers wisping from the sides; it was as if the person was on fire

notes: duplication of 火 (fire) - like a flame
mnemonic: the fire was ablaze; little flames eminated from the fire

notes: 火 (fire) + 頁 (head)
mnemonic: a bothersome situation sets one's head on fire (headache, blood boiling)

notes: semantic 氵 (water) + phonetic 炎 (passion)
mnemonic: water diluted the savor (passion) of the broth

notes: semantic 火 (fire) + phonetic 丁 (road)
kun_yomi: ひ、ほ-、ともしび、とも.す、あかり
mnemonic: a lantern is carried to light the way along the road

notes: 火 (fire) + 田 (field) - a field of crops like fire
mnemonic: (pure japanese glyph) fire-scorched land is beneficial for farm crop production

notes: 巛 (water) + 火 (fire) - sources of disaster
mnemonic: a disaster can often be seen with a river (or lake) of fire

notes: 𠂇 (hand) + 火 (fire) - fire that can be touched with the hand (ash)
mnemonic: fire that can be touched with the hand (ash); the hand which is cremated by fire

notes: semantic 灬 (black) + phonetic 占 (to have) - black dots
kun_yomi: つ.ける、つ.く、た.てる、さ.す、とぼ.す、とも.す、ぼち
mnemonic: to have a dark spot (soot) on one's face

notes: semantic 灬 (fire) + phonetic 昭 (bright) - shine the light of a fire on

The character 田 suggests the agricultural aspect, while 土 adds the sense of a land or place.

mnemonic: A man is sitting on a throne (upper-left) delivering orders from his mouth (lower-left). This is a mirror of the drawing that represents an emperor or ruler. Therefore, this would represent a captain's officer or leftenant - the one who would speak in place of the captain when needed. An eye (top-right) on legs (bottom-right) indicating one's ability to see. Together this resembles an officer making a **glance** or taking a **peek**.
